title: Limitless Wake
description: The official site of Limitless Wake Technologies (wake board instructor for hire). Web site built with a React JS framework and hosted on Netlify.

title: Go Code Stuff
description: A blazing fast blog about coding and emerging technologies. Powered by Gatsby JS, Graph QL and Mail Chimp.

title: Mountaineering Trivia
description: An educational trivia game focusing on mountaineering. Powered by HTML5 and JavaScript.

title: Zoo Snatch
description: Choose your own adventure game with an RPG interactive experience. Built with a React framework, user auth implemented with Mongo DB and interactive experience made possible with the HTML5 canvas element.

title: Color Classifier
description: A machine learning color classifier app that predicts the name of colors it's never seen before. Powered by TensorFlow JS and inspired by The Coding Train from NYU.

title: Color Survey
description: A survey app to collect rgb color label data to be used in a machine learning activity. Uses Laravel and AWS MySQL.
